episodes.title: The Reality Rewind Podcast - Daughters of the Cult Documentary (Part 1)
episodes.description:
Join Kristen and Laura at the crack of dawn as they dive into the chilling documentary 'Daughters of the Cult'. This episode explores the sinister life of Ervil LeBaron, the self-proclaimed prophet and leader of a fundamentalist Mormon cult. Ervil's journey from jealousy and manipulation to orchestrating murders within his own family highlights the depths of his delusions and control. Discover how his teachings, rooted in the macabre doctrine of blood atonement, led to a series of gruesome events, including the murder of his own brother and influential figures like Rulan Allred. This is part one of a two-part series that intertwines with the complex history of the LeBaron family and its connections to modern polygamist communities, including 'Sister Wives'. Stay tuned for part two to uncover more about the distressing experiences of Ervil's children and their quest for redemption.

00:00 Welcome and Early Morning Banter
00:57 Movie Talk and Caffeine Preferences
03:38 Introduction to Daughters of the Cult
04:18 Ervil LeBaron and His Notorious Legacy
09:09 The LeBaron Family Dynamics
14:15 Ervil's Rivalry with Joel
17:30 Ervil's New Sect and Dark Preachings
19:09 Unveiling the Cult's Dark Secrets
19:44 Ervil's Manipulative Tactics
21:25 The Isolated Community
22:24 Ervil's Family Dynamics
27:00 The Murder of Joel
31:08 The Plot Against Rulan
38:07 The Aftermath and Conclusion

For more bonus episodes, hot takes, & trash, join us over on our Patreon: patreon.com/The_Reality_Rewind_Podcast
